General.Name: Investcorp India Acquisition Corp. Class A ordinary share
General.Description: Investcorp AI Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. It focuses on effecting a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or other similar business combination with one or more businesses. The company was formerly known as Investcorp India Acquisition Corp and changed its name to Investcorp AI Acquisition Corp. in October 2024. Investcorp AI Acquisition Corp. was incorporated in 2021 and is based in George Town, the Cayman Islands.
General.Address: Century Yard, George Town, Cayman Islands, KY1-1102
